txt.en: Now that you have been entered into the pit-fighting tournament, you should show these Orcs what you can do!
'Oh no, Párgrub not realize [placeholder] so strong. Should have, err, bet more. Yes that's it. Next time we'll bet more for Párgrub.'
'Happy day for Párgrub! The fighting is about to begin! Many supplies bet on you, [placeholder]. Better, err, win for Párgrub!'\n\nPárgrub gives you a wide, sneaky grin.
Párgrub can be found near Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should speak with Párgrub about the match.
'Quickly now, you get dressed and go fight!'
